name: Tut's Tomb
overview:
Tuts Tomb was produced by Island Design in 1995.

Find King Tuts tomb

Tut's Tomb is a Shooter / Gun game developed by Island Design for the Arcade.

* Players: 2 (simultaneous)
* Buttons/Trigger: 1 (shoot)
* Off-screen Reload: No Reload
* Manufacturer: Island Design
* Platform: Arcade Emulator
* Year Released: 1996
